item.title: Duplicate HBA ports using Qlnativefc
item.description:
A small article to report some questions you could have in regards to Qlogic HBAs and ESXi 7.0.0.2

If you have recently upgaded to the version above, you probably noticed twice the amount of HBA ports in your ESXi.

This is because the qlnativefc driver has nvme support enabled and the wwnn and wwpn are same for NVMe and SCSI adapter.

To workaround this "cosmetic" issue, disable NVMe support for your HBA and reboot the host (make sure it's in maintenance mode before..)

1$ esxcfg-module -s 'ql2xnvmesupport=0' qlnativefc
2$ reboot

The duplicate ports will disappear after the reboot.

A new offical KB article will be released for this, I will publish the article as soon as it is out.
